name: AIP UniPHY
overview:
AIP UniPHY is a scientific social and professional network designed to enhance and accelerate the collaborative process among physical science researchers.

AIP UniPHY is the world’s first literature-based professional social networking site for physical scientists. The site allows physicists, engineers, and other scientists to directly connect with and explore their professional contacts and to identify researchers with the expertise needed for future collaborations.

AIP UniPHY includes publications in the SPIN (Searchable Physics Information Notices) database (click here for the publications list), and is powered by Collexisâ€™ proprietary Fingerprinting semantic technology, which enables fast and accurate knowledge retrieval and discovery, empowering individuals to search for and identify documents, researchers, trends, and new discoveries more quickly, precisely, and thoroughly than ever before. UniPHY provides intuitive interfaces for researchers to network and share data - all with the goal of advancing physics research worldwide.
